DOC.brief_title: Caminamos : A Smartphone App Connect With Walking Partners
DOC.detailed_description: Health disparity high among Latinas . They likely overweight , diagnose diabetes , physically inactive compare non-Hispanic White counterpart . Thus , intervention target improve health access ameliorate chronic disease among Latinas high public health importance . Regular physical activity ( PA ) promote physical emotional well-being , yet PA intervention tailor Latinas remain limited . Available data suggest community-focused intervention produce improvement physical activity ( PA ) well-received Latinas especially social physical environment consider ( e.g. , social support , safe walk area , etc. ) . Research suggest Latinos respond favorably technological-based health intervention . Almost 90 % Latinos cellphone ; 60 % smartphone . Thus , health promotion intervention address Latinos ' preference regard physical social environment utilizing preferred technology source ( e.g. , smartphone ) could prove highly successful . One smartphone feature offer great potential health promotion benefit location-based service ( LBS ) . LBS use geographic positioning help user connect surround environment user , thus provide real-time , user-specific information . This propose project , ¡Caminamos ! , develop smartphone app use 18-45 year old Latinas use LBS connect woman within geographically proximal neighborhood way provide social support increase walk behavior . Specific aim : ( 1 ) gather input evaluative feedback Expert Advisory Board ( EAB ) help plan assess feasibility create app ; ( 2 ) build connection gather input Latino community leader assist conceptual development app Community Advisory Board ( CAB ) ; ( 3 ) conduct online survey national sample Latinas smartphone usage health promotion , interest social network LBS technology feature ; ( 4 ) conduct iterative focus group Latinas age 18-45 year guide development app content , design , aesthetic fully develop function prototype ; ( 5 ) conduct usability test Latinas test app 's accuracy establish user ' location connect user ¡Caminamos ! system user ' use satisfaction app . Few app-based health product brand towards Latinas . ¡Caminamos ! address unmet need marketplace . It first smartphone app us location-based social networking promote PA , app kind target Latinas . It also expand upon know successful Latino exercise engagement simultaneously address key barrier exercise . Phase I outcomes provide necessary framework data develop full-scale app test randomized clinical trial . In Phase III , plan market ¡Caminamos ! directly consumer partnership company interested expand brand outreach Latina population .
